surge.tools.makers.MusicMaker module¶

Created on Oct 31, 2015

@author: josephdavancens

class surge.tools.makers.MusicMaker.MusicMaker(instrument=None, name=None, rhythm_makers=None, stages=None, time_signatures=None)[source]¶

MusicMaker calls a specified rhythm maker with a list of time signatures for each specified stage. If no rhythm maker is supplied, or the current stage is inactive, MusicMaker creates a list of full measure skips.

Returns a voice with rhythms on middle-c, skips or both.

name¶
stages¶

stop_stage¶

surge.tools.makers.RatioMaker module¶

Makes a ratio from a list of time signatures to use as input to a rhythm maker.
